p.span: Each tablet contains 150 mg of ivacaftor.
Read the package leaflet before use.

title.value: 11. NAME AND ADDRESS OF THE MARKETING AUTHORISATION HOLDER

h1.span: PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON THE OUTER PACKAGING

title.value: PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON THE OUTER PACKAGING

p.span: Each sachet of granules contains 25 mg of ivacaftor.

div.p: 4 individual wallets with 14 sachets per wallet

p.span: Read the package leaflet before use.
Mix the entire content of a sachet with 5 mL of age‑appropriate soft food or liquid that is at or below room temperature and consume it completely.
Use within one hour after mixing, just before or after a fat‑containing meal or snack.
